text: None of the money mentioned in this subchapter shall be assignable, either in law or equity, or be subject to execution or levy by attachment, garnishment, or other legal process.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 31-1217.

1973 Ed., § 31-718.

DC CODE § 38-2001.17

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Funds not subject to assignment, execution or levy.
